events.name: Git for humans
events.description: The aim of this event is to spread the knowledge of git and version controlling system to help young students get more familiar with open source technologies.

venue.name: Gandhinagar institute of technology
venue.address_1: Khatraj-Kalol Road, Moti Bhoyan, Gandhinagar district

events.name: Google IO18 Extended & Flutter code lab
events.description:
Note: due to some unavoidable circumstances we have to push the meetup to 13 may. we are sorry if we caused any inconvenience.

The goal of I/O Extended events is to bring developer communities closer to gain a mesmerizing experience of the I/O keynote and sessions amongst themselves dynamically, at any corner worldwide.we are also hosting a flutter code lab.

Flutter is Google’s mobile app SDK for crafting high-quality native interfaces on iOS and Android in record time. Flutter works with existing code, is used by developers and organizations around the world, and is free and open source.

-- what to bring

you need to bring laptops for the flutter code lab and it will be good if you can manage your own internet connection you are required to have a working installation of flutter you can download flutter from https://flutter.io/get-started/install/
You will learn how to start with Flutter. Flutter uses Dart as a language. In this meetup, you will also learn the basics of Dart which is required to start with Flutter.

Speakers:
1) Name: Dhrumil Shah, Mobile Developer @Shipmnts & Co-organiser @GDGAhmedabad
About: Dhrumil Shah, The Mobile Developer at Shipmnts, Co-Organiser of GDG Ahmedabad. Dhrumil Shah has completed his masters in Computer engineering specialize in Wireless & Mobile Computing. Being a techno freak, his interest lies in developing apps, sharing knowledge by delivering a talk, workshop and doing research.

2) Name: Parth Jansari, Co-Founder @Zypher @ Co-organiser @GDGGandhinagar
About: Parth is a guy who is trying to grow up and do mature stuff and work but ends up designing, playing games(most of the time) or watching Movies/Tv Series. Parth has five years of experience in designing and two years experience in front-end development. Parth uses Angular for Creating frontend, ionic and Flutter to create hybrid apps. Parth has mastery over most of the adobe creative suite apps.
Currently, Parth is exploring Flutter as he believes it can be a replacement for ionic 2 and all other hybrid app frameworks.

events.name: Flutter Study Jam - learn how to create beautiful ui
events.description:
note: this study jam requires you to have a working installation of flutter & basic knowledge about flutter

Flutter Study Jams are Community-run study groups based on the Flutter Udacity Course. Participants learn how to use Flutter to develop high-quality, interactive mobile applications for iOS and Android devices.

in this study jam, we will learn to craft an app with beautiful ui and some ways to implement common ui patterns with flutter

Join GDG Gandhinagar for our Flutter Study Jam!
Speakers:
1) Parth Jansari
Talk Title: Create Jaw-Dropping UI with Flutter
About: Parth is a guy who is trying to grow up and do mature stuff and work but ends up designing, playing games(most of the time) or watching Movies/Tv Series.Parth has five years of experience in designing and two years experience in front-end development. Parth uses Angular for Creating frontend, ionic and Flutter to create hybrid apps. Parth has mastery over most of the adobe creative suite apps.
Currently, Parth is exploring Flutter as he believes it can be a replacement for ionic 2 and all other hybrid app frameworks.

2) Bhavik Makwana:
He is working as an Android Developer at Multidots Solution Pvt Ltd.
An Open source enthusiast, Google Certified Associate Android Developer and Google Scholar for the Android Nanodegree.
He is a fanboy of Flutter and ConstraintLayout

If you have any problems installing flutter do not hesitate to send a message to the organizers.

some useful links for flutter:

how to install flutter:
Windows/Linux/Mac would all be fine. Check out: https://flutter.io/get-started/install/

hello world app with flutter:
https://medium.com/gdg-gandhinagar/create-nothing-app-with-flutter-f27e5652668a

events.name: Devfest Gandhingar
events.description:
GDG DevFest Gandhinagar brings together the renowned experts in Android, Web and Cloud technologies to Gandhinagar for sessions, workshops and showcases.
Described by many as 'Best Tech Conference' in Gandhinagar, our team creates DevFest to be the best place for experience sharing in a phenomenal atmosphere.

events.name: Flutter Live Extended & Codelab
events.description:
Join us for Flutter Live on December 16th to experience the latest from Flutter, Google’s free and open source SDK for building high-quality native iOS and Android apps from a single codebase. Presented from the Science Museum in London, Flutter Live is a global celebration of Flutter. With viewing parties around the world and streaming live from the venue, we've designed Flutter Live to be a great event wherever you are.

We will be hosting code lab.

What to bring:
-> Lot of energy
-> Your laptop with Flutter SDK setup and IDE ready to work with Flutter.

events.name: AwwVision with Google Cloud Platform
events.description:
Introduction to GCP. Machine Learning services that GCP provides. Why reinvent the wheels that are available? You will get to know,
- What is Google cloud
- What is Kubernates and it's 8 components
- Also, you will see live, how to create a cluster and use vision API in the cloud.
Lastly, Awwvision is a Kubernates and cloud API that uses vision API to classify Reddit's r/aww images.

events.name: Google Cloud Serverless Bigdata Service
events.description:
Getting started with Google Cloud Serverless Bigdata Service s
- Introduction to Google Cloud Bigdata Services
- Introduction to BigQuery, Google Cloud Storage & Data Prep
- Use cases & Approaches
- Power of serverless technologies for big data analytics
- Demo of Serverless data processing Pipeline
- Best Practices to design bigdata processing Pipelines

In Use cases and approaches, I will also cover some of the Bigdata architectures.

speaker bio:
Jigar Navadiya is the Tech Lead at Tatvic, data analytics consulting company & Google Cloud Partner. He is Google Cloud Certified Professional in Data Engineering & Cloud Architect. He is helping customers on their journey to Google Cloud Platform and through the Digital Transformation.

events.name: IWD Celebration Gandhinagar 2019 - Women Techmakers
events.description:
[WTM]

Now, more than ever, there's a strong call for woman to step forward and dare to challenge the world. That's why International Women's Day is an important moment to recognize, We are happy to announce International Women's Day celebration at #WTMGandhinagar organized by Google Developers Group Gandhinagar

Date: 05th May, 2019
Time: 10:00 am to 05:00 pm

Don't miss the chance to be part of our event and attend different talks & workshops with successful women ;)
Registration opening soon and an early access for slack group members too!

#IWD19 #WTMGandhinagar #GDGGandhinagar #IWDGandhinagar #GDGGnr

events.name: #Hack19: International Flutter Hackathon
events.description:
Details
Join us on Saturday, June 1st, 2019 for the first-ever all-day International Flutter Hackathon organized by communities worldwide.
Join a team of 2-5 fellow developers(or get paired on the event) to build something amazing in #Flutter and #Hummingbird. At the end of the event, all participants will vote on their favorite projects and the winners will receive prizes and bragging rights 😎 ✌️

register at https://forms.gle/ju8SoGCCanLqQWVr5 then you will receive rsvp link

For more information visit:
https://flutterhackathon.com/
